div.t-if: not no_breadcrumbs and not my_details and not breadcrumbs_searchbar

div.class: row align-items-center bg-white g-0 border rounded
pt-3 pt-lg-0 col-12 col-md col-lg-4 col-xl-3 o_my_sidebar

nav.t-attf-class: navbar navbar-light navbar-expand-lg border py-0 mb-2 o_portal_navbar {{classes if classes else ''}} {{'mt-3 rounded' if breadcrumbs_searchbar else 'border-top-0' }}

div.class: nav flex-column flex-lg-row ms-auto p-0 mb-3 mb-lg-0 mt-1 mt-lg-0

t.p: There are currently no orders to deliver for you.

div.class: row justify-content-center text-center d-print-none pt-1 pb-4

div.t-attf-class: pb-2 pt-3 #{'card-header bg-white' if report_type == 'html' else ''}

div.t-if: sale_order.transaction_ids and not invoices and sale_order.state in ('sent', 'sale') and portal_confirmation == 'pay' and not success and not error

t.t-value: True in [line.discount > 0 for line in sale_order.order_line]

tr.t-att-class: 'bg-200 fw-bold o_line_section' if line.display_type == 'line_section' else 'fst-italic o_line_note' if line.display_type == 'line_note' else ''+'o_line_item'

tr.t-if: current_section and (line_last or lines_to_report[line_index+1].display_type == 'line_section') and not line.is_downpayment

input.placeholder: Scan Barcode or Weight in Kgs
